comments.body: Perhaps add a `#!/usr/bin/env node` above this and make it executable?
It'd be nice to have a `flatMap`, right? It's in node.js v12 (as is `flat`), but unfortunately we can't use it here unless we upgrade.

Yes, this block is copy pasted from the alternative implementation of `flatMap` from [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array/flatMap) ðŸ˜„ 

Same for the local method `fetch` - it would be nice to use `node-fetch`, but I did not want to add npm dependencies.
